testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" last name "tester"...................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user enter password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user click in register button...........................................passed Then success massage displayed..............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user could use login functionality to use their account
testcase.name: user could login whit valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user could use login functionality to use their account
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | user could use currencies Functionality to select the Kind of Currency
testcase.name: User could select the kind of currency
testcase.system-out: When Select Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed And Use hard assertion to verify Euro Symbol "€" is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page.passed

testcase.classname: F06_homeSliders | user could click on Sliders
testcase.name: first slider (Nokia Lumia 1020) is clickable on home page
testcase.failure:
When user click on first slider Nokia Lumia 1020............................passed Then user go to Nokia Lumia 1020 page.......................................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:110) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1413) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:149) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:131) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:655) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:665) at org.example.stepDefs.D06_homeSlidersStepDef.userGoToNokiaLumiaPage(D06_homeSlidersStepDef.java:34) at ✽.user go to Nokia Lumia 1020 page(file:///D:/MY%20Brojct/demonopcommerce/src/main/resources/features/F06_homeSliders.feature:6)
